column1: al-ṣan‘ah. raṣad. zajalun li’abī mudīn al-ghawth

column2: yā al-lāym law rīt mā jrá

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raṣad. qaṣīdah. basīṭun li’abī al-ṭīb al-nafzī

column2: yā ṭl‘t al-badr lā annah basharun
ammā hawāk falā yubqī walā yadar
ant al-muná wal-manāyā fīk qud jumi‘at
huw al-ḥubb fāislam bi-al-ḥashā mā al-hawá sahl

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. raṣad. qaṣīdah. sarī‘un lizubaydah zawjat al-rashīd
al-ṣan‘ah. raṣad. tawshīḥ raml lābin sahil
